sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些动词均有"接受，接纳"之意。
means: accept ：强调主动地或自愿地接受，或者说，经过考虑后同意接受。
receive ：着重仅仅接到或收到这一支轮船或事实，而不含采取主动或积极行动的意思。
admit ：作"接受"讲时，强调准许或批准。
take ：与receive同意，是receive的日常用法，侧重不带主观意愿地收下或接受。

sentence.Network_en: He would have to accept it; there was no other way.
sentence.Network_cn: 对此他将别无选择，只有接受。

sentence.Network_en: Some of the older telephones still only accept tokens.
sentence.Network_cn: 一些较老式的电话机仍然只收代币。

sentence.Network_en: Initially the government was unwilling to accept the defeat.
sentence.Network_cn: 最初政府不愿意承认失败。

means.word_mean: 接受;相信;同意
其他释义
接受;同意;承认
其他释义

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English : from Latin acceptare, frequentative of accipere 'take something to oneself', from ad- 'to' + capere 'take'

encyclopedia.content: 表达式简介 在一个套接口接受一个连接。accept() 是c语言中网络编程的重要的函数，和windows 编程也有所不同，其不是在winsock.h头文件中，而是在#include <sys/socket.h>中。 文件包含 #include <sys/socket.h> 原型 SOCKET PASCAL FAR accept( SOCKET s, struct sockaddr FAR* addr,int FAR* addrlen); 参数 s：套接口描述字，该套接口在listen()后监听连接。 addr：（可选）指针，指向一缓冲区，其中接收为通讯层

entry.def: If you accept something that you have been offered, you say yes to it or agree to take it.

example.ex: Eventually Sam persuaded her to accept an offer of marriage...
example.tran: 最终萨姆说服她接受了求婚。

example.ex: Your old clothes will be gratefully accepted by jumble sale organisers...
example.tran: 旧货义卖的组织者会感激地领受您捐赠的旧衣物。

entry.tran: 相信（观点、陈述、事实等）；认为…正确
entry.def: If you accept an idea, statement, or fact, you believe that it is true or valid.

example.ex: I do not accept that there is any kind of crisis in British science...
example.tran: 我不相信英国科学界有什么危机。

example.ex: I don't think they would accept that view...
example.tran: 我认为他们不会接受那种观点。

entry.def: If you accept a plan or an intended action, you agree to it and allow it to happen.

example.ex: ...Britain's reluctance to accept a proposal for a single European currency...
example.tran: 英国不愿接受单一欧洲货币的建议

example.ex: The Council will meet to decide if it should accept his resignation.
example.tran: 委员会将召开会议决定是否接受他的辞呈。

entry.def: If you accept an unpleasant fact or situation, you get used to it or recognize that it is necessary or cannot be changed.

example.ex: People will accept suffering that can be shown to lead to a greater good...
example.tran: 如果能证明眼前的苦难会带来更大的好处，人们就会愿意承受。

example.ex: Urban dwellers often accept noise as part of city life...
example.tran: 城市居民常将噪音当成城市生活的一部分。

entry.tran: 承兑，认付（单据等）；认可(文件等)
entry.def: If a person, company, or organization accepts something such as a document, they recognize that it is genuine, correct, or satisfactory and agree to consider it or handle it.

example.ex: We advised newspapers not to accept the advertising...
example.tran: 我们建议报社不要承接这项广告。

example.ex: Cheques can only be accepted up to the value guaranteed on the card...
example.tran: 支票的承兑金额不可高于卡上所担保的数额。

entry.tran: 招收，接纳（求职者、会员等)
entry.def: If an organization or person accepts you, you are allowed to join the organization or use the services that are offered.

example.ex: All-male groups will not be accepted.
example.tran: 清一色的男性团体将不被接纳。

example.ex: ...incentives to private landlords to accept young people as tenants.
example.tran: 鼓励私人房东租房给年轻人的措施

entry.def: If a person or a group of people accepts you, they begin to be friendly towards you and are happy with who you are or what you do.

example.ex: My grandparents have never had a problem accepting me...
example.tran: 我的祖父母从来都是无条件地接受我。

example.ex: Many men still have difficulty accepting a woman as a business partner...
example.tran: 许多男性仍然无法接受女性商业伙伴。

entry.def: If you accept the responsibility or blame for something, you recognize that you are responsible for it.

example.ex: The company cannot accept responsibility for loss or damage.
example.tran: 公司不承担丢失或损坏的责任。

entry.def: If you accept someone's advice or suggestion, you agree to do what they say.

example.ex: The army refused to accept orders from the political leadership...
example.tran: 军队拒绝接受政界领导层下达的命令。

example.ex: Don't automatically accept the solicitor recommended by the broker.
example.tran: 别想当然地就接受中间人推荐的诉状律师。

entry.tran: 接受并使（移植器官）发挥正常功能;不排斥
entry.def: If someone's body accepts a transplanted organ, the organ becomes part of the body and starts to function normally.

example.ex: ...drugs which will fool the body into accepting transplants.
example.tran: 能使身体顺利接受移植器官的药物

entry.def: If a machine accepts a particular kind of thing, it is designed to take it and deal with it or process it.

example.ex: The telephone booths accept 10 and 20 pence coins.
example.tran: 电话亭可使用10便士和20便士的硬币。

means.word_mean: 1. consider or hold as true;

sentences.sentence: "I cannot accept the dogma of this church"

means.word_mean: 2. receive willingly something given or offered;

sentences.sentence: "The only girl who would have him was the miller's daughter"
"I won't have this dog in my house!"

means.word_mean: 3. give an affirmative reply to; respond favorably to;
4. react favorably to; consider right and proper;

sentences.sentence: "People did not accept atonal music at that time"
"We accept the idea of universal health care"

means.word_mean: 5. admit into a group or community;

sentences.sentence: "We'll have to vote on whether or not to admit a new member"

means.word_mean: 6. take on as one's own the expenses or debts of another person;
7. tolerate or accommodate oneself to;

sentences.sentence: "I shall have to accept these unpleasant working conditions"
"She has learned to live with her husband's little idiosyncracies"

means.word_mean: 8. be designed to hold or take;

sentences.sentence: "This surface will not take the dye"

means.word_mean: 9. of a deliberative body: receive (a report) officially, as from a committee
10. make use of or accept for some purpose;
11. be sexually responsive to, used of a female domesticated mammal;

auth_sentence.content: Madrid says it will not accept a pro-independence vote.
auth_sentence.res_content: Madrid says it will not accept a pro-independence vote.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Madrid says it will not accept a pro-independence vote.

auth_sentence.content: The BBC homepage does not accept submissions or requests.
auth_sentence.res_content: The BBC homepage does not accept submissions or requests.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The BBC homepage does not accept submissions or requests.

auth_sentence.content: I just accept the things I can't change.
auth_sentence.res_content: I just accept the things I can't change.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I just accept the things I can't change.

stems_affixes.word_buile: de坏+cept拿,抓,握住+ive……的→拿坏的东西来→欺骗性的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 易受感染的,易受影响的
stems_affixes.word_buile: sus下+cept拿+ible能……的→能被[病]拿下→易受影响
con共同+cept拿,抓,握住→共同把握→共同的想法→观念,概念
in进入+cept拿,抓,握住+ion动作或状态→开始拿住→开端
per全部+cept拿,抓,握住+ion状态→全部抓住→理解;感知
pre预先+cept拿,抓,握住→预先拿好的话→箴言
re再+ceipt=cept抓→再次拿到→得到的收据
re再+cept拿,抓,握住+acle东西→拿东西的东西→容器
ac再+cept拿,抓,握住→一再拿→接受

Sentence.sentence: But if he had accepted it, he wouldn't be able to make ends meet.
The creative process has always been accepted as the source of all important work in the arts, but we should not think the creativity plays a role only in the arts.
What is the widely accepted idea about the creative process
Though the Swedish model appears workable for most American parents, it may not be accepted by them in its entirety.
Why did you sales people accept them?
We have to accept them; otherwise, we don't get the contracts

means.word_mean: 接受, 领受, 收受

sentences.en: If you accept, please let me know.
sentences.cn: 如果你接受的话, 请通知我。

means.word_mean: 承担责任; 承兑

sentences.cn: 这家公司承兑私人支票。

means.word_mean: 承认, 同意; 认为, 相信

sentences.en: Please accept me as a friend.
The police accepted his story as true.
sentences.cn: 警察对他的话信以为真。

sentences.en: He accepted me as having seen the much of the world.

means.word_mean: 赞成，赞同；同意(某种看法)

sentences.cn: 菲利普斯乐于赞成这个观点。

means.word_mean: 吸收，吸

sentences.en: a wood that will not accept oil paints

means.word_mean: 理解；领会，懂

sentences.en: How is this sentence to be accepted?

means.word_mean: 【法律】受理；应(聘等)

sentences.en: I cannot accept you as my assistant.
sentences.cn: 我不能聘你为我的助理。

jushi.english: He offered her a lift and she accepted.
jushi.chinese: 他请她坐他的车,她同意了。

jushi.english: If you accept,　please let me know.
jushi.chinese: 如果你接受的话,请通知我。

jushi.english: After a little persuasion, he accepted.
jushi.chinese: 稍加劝说后,他就接受了。
